TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_pwn_Rahaw,_Takan, title = Rahaw,_Takan, year = 2024, month = December, day = 7, note = {In Wikipedia [Paiwan]}, url = {https://pwn.wikipedia.org/wiki/Rahaw,_Takan} }

S.FORM: Rahaw(Takan) Itiniay i Fuxing Cen no Taoyuan ko Rahaw(Takan) a niyaro', 60 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 217 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 93% ko ka'aloman no Yincomin, polong han i, 202 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 7% ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 15 ko tamdaw. O pa-sin-to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Tayal87%, Amis1%, Bunun1%, Truku1%, roma2%. Ira ko Kiwkay i niyaro'.

Rahaw(Takan) Itiniay i Foxing Cen no Taoyoan ko Rahaw(Takan) a niyaro', 60 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 217 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 93% ko ka'aloman no Yincomin, polong han i, 202 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 7% ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 15 ko tamdaw. O pa-sin-to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Tayal87%, Amis1%, Bonon1%, Troko1%, roma2%. Ira ko Kiwkay i niyaro'.
